body_html: I just tried the new one. It still generates a huge diff. I dug a bit more. It seems this is unavoidable because the notebook is saved as a json file with nonlocal changes. This is not diff friendly by construction. There was even a project called nbdiff trying to deal with this. However, nbdiff seems to be no longer maintained. It was based on older ipython API and is not runnable, for example, in the Udacity docker environment. How should I proceed?
